sub_title: Engineering Project Leader at ASML | Leading Hardware Product Development Projects that keep Moore's Law Alive
summary:
I’m a passionate, proactive and determined problem solver with over 15 years of engineering and project management experience focused mainly on the semiconductor capital equipment domain. Expertise in end-to-end product life cycle management in both NPI and sustaining engineering. Having extensive work experience across continents and cultures in India, Singapore, Netherlands, and the US, leading and collaborating with global teams are my strengths. 

I currently lead a multidisciplinary project team developing next-gen semiconductor equipment. My forte has been in system architecture and engineering design with a focus on electrical and control engineering, while closely collaborating with cross functional engineering teams.

profile_positions.description:
Technical Project Lead / Project Team Lead for ASML-HMI's eBeam Platform

My key responsibilities:
-	Leading a cross-functional NPI project team of ~10-15fte 
-	Balancing the triple constraint of scope – timing – resources while maintaining quality and mitigating risks
-	Managing stakeholders across and outside the organization
-	Creating and maintaining project and team plans in MS Project
-	Reporting project status towards PM organization
-	Managing multiple outsourcing/farm-out partners
-	Supplier management in the NPI phase
-	Assisting the Group Manager in team development, appraisals and recruitment 
-	Looking out for the wellbeing of the team; keeping them motivated; mentoring and coaching where needed

Key skills that I use and develop everyday:
- Leadership, persuasiveness, decisiveness, being pro-active, taking ownership, identifying and removing roadblocks, being pragmatic
profile_positions.title: Project Team Lead

profile_positions.description:
Function architect for Electrical Infrastructure on ASML - HMI eBeam metrology and inspection platform

My key responsibilities:
-	Defining high level electrical architecture including system wide LV AC/DC power distribution and control, electrical and functional safety, I/O control, cable routing, E-cabinet/rack designs and the responsibility for system wide electrical safety compliance to international standards.
-	Be the interface between System Engineering, Program Management and the electrical design team. Responsible for the quality of end-to-end electrical design deliverables in the system engineering V-curve.
-	Create and manage interface specifications with cross-functional architects from mechanical, flow/vacuum, motion control, wafer stage and software functions, among others.
- Perform concept and feasibility studies in early phases of NPI projects; work with decision matrices and align with cross-sectoral stakeholders to make the right architectural choices in the product.
-	Together with the Project Lead, create work breakdown structure and effort estimates to enable budget discussions at the start of NPI projects.
- Creating and maintaining a 2 to 5 year technological roadmap for eBeam electrical infrastructure.
-	Electrical safety competence lead for San Jose, CA, engineering office. Expertise in NFPA79, IEC 60204-1, SEMI S22 and SEMI F47 standards, among others.
- Mentoring and coaching junior and senior designers on technical topics.
